Custom y-axis for grid plots

Source: R/utils-grid.R
grid.yaxis2.Rd

Create a custom y-axis for grid plots

Usage

grid.yaxis2(
  at = NULL,
  breaks = 5,
  labels = NULL,
  tick.len = 0.5,
  label.space = 0.25,
  side = c("left", "right"),
  rot = 0,
  label.size = 12
)

Arguments

at

Position of ticks

breaks

Number of breaks

labels

Tick labels

tick.len

Tick length

label.space

Space between ticks and labels

side

Side of the axis (left or right)

rot

Label rotation

label.size

Label font size

Value

None

Author

mixfruit

On this page

Developed by Fruit Mix.
